messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine an art office with 21 artists. Amy is working with Bob, Cal, Dan, Eva, Fay, and Gus. Ian is working with Joe, Kim, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola. Sue is working with Tom, Zac, Kai, Liv, Pam, and Gia. Fay is working with Gus, Bob, Cal, Dan, and Eva. Cal is working with Dan, Eva, Gus, and Bob. Kim is working with Dan, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola. Ned is working with Ola, Joe, Leo, and Max. Pam is working with Gia, Tom, Zac, Kai, and Liv. Eva is working with Gus, Bob and Zac. Leo is working with Max, Ola, and Joe. Max is connected to Ola and Joe. Liv is working with Gia, Tom, Zac, and Kai. Gus is working with Bob, and Dan. Ola is working with Joe. Gia is working Tom, Zac, and Kai. Bob is working with Dan. Joe is working with Kai. Kai is working with Tom. Tom is working with Zac. You were told that if you work with Joe, he can get you art supplies worth $100 for free. Dan gives you his magic painting that can get you working with anyone you want only once. At the same time, you have been told that Dan and Kim are no longer working together. From Dan what is the path to the person you should work with to get the most reward? Please list the names in order, separated by commas.

The first line contains an integer T, the number of test cases.
The first line of each test case contains an integer N, the number of artists.
The second line contains N space-separated integers A1, A2, ..., AN, the names of the artists.
The third line contains an integer M, the number of pairs of artists.
The fourth line contains M space-separated pairs of integers, the pairs of artists.
The fifth line contains an integer Q, the number of questions.
The sixth line contains an integer K, the number of answers.
The seventh line contains an integer R, the regular expression for the answer.

For each test case, print Q lines. The i-th line should contain the answer to the i-th question.
The answer should be printed following the regular expression R.

You are given a string S. You need to find the longest palindromic substring in S.
A substring is a contiguous sequence of characters within a string.
A palindromic substring is a substring that is a palindrome.
A palindrome is a string that is equal to its reverse.
For example,
